thread.title: Steve Womack

author: Steve Womack
title: Steve Womack
text: I don't believe the usage explanations cover everything. I have questions... I get no response. I'm not trying to pull a fast one... so, don't come after me with..."hey, we're suing you for posting your project online, in a theater or on the radio." You have to pay more... you're stealing the items you paid to use. So, I'm crossing my fingers. Pretty sure I read that right...
